mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.requirements_id AS "requirements", a.requirement_child_title AS "requirementChildTitle", a.item_belonds AS "itemBelonds", a.business_system AS "businessSystem", a.requirement_emergency AS "requirementEmergency", a.except_finish AS "exceptFinish", a.responsible_tax_person AS "responsibleTaxPerson", a.related_business_requirements AS "relatedBusinessRequirements", a.demand_no AS "demandNo", a.target_desc AS "targetDesc", a.contact AS "contact", a.appendix AS "appendix", a.demand_approve_person AS "demandApprovePerson", a.demand_approve_phone AS "demandApprovePhone", a.comments AS "comments", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO requirement_child( id, requirements_id, requirement_child_title, item_belonds, business_system, requirement_emergency, except_finish, responsible_tax_person, related_business_requirements, demand_no, target_desc, contact, appendix, demand_approve_person, demand_approve_phone, comments, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{requirements}, #{requirementChildTitle}, #{itemBelonds}, #{businessSystem}, #{requirementEmergency}, #{exceptFinish}, #{responsibleTaxPerson}, #{relatedBusinessRequirements}, #{demandNo}, #{targetDesc}, #{contact}, #{appendix}, #{demandApprovePerson}, #{demandApprovePhone}, #{comments}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE requirement_child SET requirements_id = #{requirements}, requirement_child_title = #{requirementChildTitle}, item_belonds = #{itemBelonds}, business_system = #{businessSystem}, requirement_emergency = #{requirementEmergency}, except_finish = #{exceptFinish}, responsible_tax_person = #{responsibleTaxPerson}, related_business_requirements = #{relatedBusinessRequirements}, demand_no = #{demandNo}, target_desc = #{targetDesc}, contact = #{contact}, appendix = #{appendix}, demand_approve_person = #{demandApprovePerson}, demand_approve_phone = #{demandApprovePhone}, comments = #{comments}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
update requirement_child rc set rc.examine_status = '1' WHERE rc.id=#{id}
